V]
July 11, 1955
lift*. Kenneth Wright
Director of Broadcasting
Box 8U50
The University of Tennessee
Knoxville, Tennessee
Dear Kent
As you know, we had one paragraph left over from
your Radio Report which we mailed out with the July
Newsletter* I just want to remind you that the deadÂ¬
line for the August issue is July 20*
I am reminding you now because I am leaving
tomorrow for three weeks. We can use the one paragraph
left over and another paragraph idea to make up the
August report. Incidentally, I am anxious we keep these
reports to one page, although we are willing to run on
the second page if and when we have to. Actually, one
good idea a month will make the reports worthwhile.
Kind personal regards.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Sehooley
^resident
